revised_title: Nonlinear Theory of Stability of Plane Poiseuille Flow in the Subcritical Range
tldr: The author presents a new approach to the nonlinear theory of stability for plane Poiseuille flow in the subcritical range. They propose a method to determine the threshold amplitude for disturbances in the flow, which is compared with experimental observations. The results show that the new approach provides a more accurate prediction of the threshold amplitude than previous methods.
